entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to a few flurries this evening then to periods of drizzle near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle early in the morning then 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Overcast. Low minus 10.
